description:
Very cozy modern studio/1 bedroom in the heart of West Harlem. One block away from the express and local ABCD trains that take you anywhere in the city. Another block from the famous Apollo theatre. Columbia University is a 10 minute walk. I live on restaurant row where the night life and restaurants are booming. 
Disclaimer: My lovely pup does not come with the rental. ;)

Modern apartment with laundry in the basement. Cable and wifi included. Stainless steel fully stocked kitchen. The bed is queen size and the couch is a pull out which can accommodate another two people. Clean towels and sheets would be provided. Anything else you need, just let me know!

Wifi, cable tv, shared backyard, laundry in basement, and express subway one block away.

It's the Mecca of all things New York City where every culture comes together to offer you the best of what the city has to offer.

Yup! The ABC and D are just around the corner. The 2 and 3 are about a 10 minute walk the other way. You can get to any part of the city from here.
name: Quaint Studio in West Harlem - Up to Four Guests
review: Muy buen departamento, equipado con buena Cocina, cama cómoda y sofa-cama amplió y muy cómodo, el único problema fue encontrar fundas de almohadas, colchas y alfombras llenas de pelo de perro, era inevitable llenarte de pelo de perro en la ropa. La ubicación buena con subway a dos cuadras y como 15 minutos a time square y abajo del edificio una tienda de abarrotes con todo lo necesario que uno necesite.
